title: tryn spin, does it count for impact rune?
body: I might not be seeing it or something, but it doesn't seem to be adding lethality after I spin onto minions or champs. does it actually work for tryn or not?

replies.body: If you check your runes stats in your match history, you should be able to check damage added by that mastery.  If it's not working on TrynSpin, it would only apply on flash for him so it would be super low.  If it's not a low number, then it's working

Sudden Impact shouldn't be working on minions, so that's normal, but yea I'm pretty sure his spin does count as a dash so it should apply when he hits a champion. I'd recommend posting this over in Report a Bug to make sure the devs can see it!
